name: portfolio-reactjs
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n front,back -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev" "npm --prefix ./backend run dev"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: Brad
